info.title: Backend API
info.description: Backend API for engineering project management

post.description: 使用 LINE ID 獲取訪問令牌

schema.title: Response Query Photos Photos Query Get

post.description:
上傳照片檔案的端點

Args:
    file: 上傳的檔案，必須是圖片格式
    user_id: 使用者ID
    group_id: 群組ID
    case_id: 案件ID（選填）
    
Returns:
    Photo: 已創建的照片記錄

schema.title: Response Query Attendance Attendance Query Get

get.description: Get all attendance records that don't have clock-out times

schema.title: Response Get Incomplete Attendance Attendance Incomplete Get
Response Delete Worklog Worklogs  Worklog Id  Delete

get.description:
取得特定材料的庫存異動紀錄
- material_id: 材料ID
- skip: 跳過幾筆
- limit: 回傳筆數限制
- start_date: 開始日期 (選填)
- end_date: 結束日期 (選填)
- status: 狀態 (選填, 入庫/出庫)

schema.title: Response Get Material Inventory Logs Materials Inventory Material  Material Id  Get
Response Get Equipment Borrow Logs Equipments  Equipment Id  Borrow Logs Get
Response Get Employee Salaries Employees  Employee Id  Salaries Get
Response Get Employee Certificates Employees  Employee Id  Certificates Get

post.description: 上傳證照檔案，並建立 Certificate 資料
